requirement_tested: A frontend that fetches all data from backend APIs
user_persona: A visitor browsing the forum for interesting discussions.
user_goal: View a list of forum posts loaded dynamically from the backend.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Alex opens the forum homepage expecting to see a list of posts fetched from the server.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage URL in browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page displays a list of forum posts retrieved from the backend API endpoint `/api/posts`.

requirement_tested: A backend that connects to an external PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A developer deploying the application locally.
user_goal: Verify that the backend successfully connects to the PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: Jamie runs the backend service locally ensuring it connects to PostgreSQL using correct environment variables.
narrative_steps.action: Start backend server with environment variables set: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, etc.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Backend logs confirm successful connection to PostgreSQL database named 'myapp'.

requirement_tested: A homepage displaying a list of forum posts
user_persona: A casual reader interested in recent forum activity.
user_goal: Browse the latest posts shown on the homepage.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Homepage Content
narrative_steps.description: Taylor visits the homepage and expects to see a vertical list of forum posts.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Homepage renders a vertically scrollable list of forum posts, each showing title, author, category tag, creation date, and content preview.

requirement_tested: A search bar to enable users to search for posts by keywords
user_persona: Someone looking for specific topics discussed in the forum.
user_goal: Search for posts containing a particular keyword.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Search Query
narrative_steps.description: Jordan wants to find posts about 'JavaScript frameworks', so he types the phrase into the search bar.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'JavaScript frameworks' into the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Input field accepts the typed text without errors.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Search Request
narrative_steps.description: After typing the query, Jordan presses Enter to submit the search.
narrative_steps.action: Press Enter key after filling the search input.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System performs a GET request to `/api/search?query=JavaScript%20frameworks` and updates the post list accordingly.

requirement_tested: Category filtering functionality to browse posts by category
user_persona: A tech enthusiast focusing only on software-related discussions.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Category Tags
narrative_steps.description: Morgan sees a row of category tags below the search bar and looks for 'Software'.
narrative_steps.action: Scan horizontally scrollable category tags beneath the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tags like 'Software', 'Hardware', 'Networking' are visible and styled with slate gray against ghost white background.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Category Tag
narrative_steps.description: Morgan clicks on the 'Software' tag to filter the displayed posts.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Software' category tag.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only posts tagged under 'Software' appear in the feed below.

requirement_tested: A post creation form allowing users to create new forum posts
user_persona: An active community member wanting to share knowledge.
user_goal: Create a new post titled 'Understanding React Hooks'.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Post Creation Form
narrative_steps.description: Riley, logged in, clicks the 'New Post' button to open the form modal.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'New Post' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal or dedicated page opens with fields for title, category selection, and content editing area.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Out the Form
narrative_steps.description: Riley fills in the title, selects 'Frontend Development' from the dropdown, and writes a detailed explanation in the editor.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in the title, select a category, and type content in the rich-text editor.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All form fields accept input correctly and reflect Riley's entries.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting New Post
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with the draft, Riley clicks the 'Submit' button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form data is sent via POST to `/api/posts/create`, and the new post appears at the top of the homepage.

requirement_tested: A reply functionality enabling users to respond to existing posts
user_persona: A participant joining a discussion thread.
user_goal: Add a helpful comment to someone else's post.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Post Detail Page
narrative_steps.description: Casey clicks on a post titled 'Best Practices for Node.js Security' to read more and possibly contribute.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the post item from the homepage listing.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the post detail page showing full content and existing replies.

narrative_steps.title: Writing a Reply
narrative_steps.description: Impressed by the article, Casey scrolls down and types a thoughtful reply in the textbox at the bottom.
narrative_steps.action: Type response in the reply textarea located at the end of the post details.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Textarea captures the reply text accurately.

narrative_steps.title: Posting the Reply
narrative_steps.description: After proofreading, Casey submits the reply by clicking the 'Submit' button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button next to the reply textbox.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Reply is posted under the current post via POST to `/api/replies/create` and immediately visible below the previous replies.

requirement_tested: A user center page displaying personal information, own posts, and reply history
user_persona: A registered user reviewing their contributions.
user_goal: Access their profile and review past activities.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing User Center
narrative_steps.description: Patricia clicks her username in the header to visit her user center.
narrative_steps.action: Click the user profile link/icon in the navigation header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the user center page (`/api/user/profile`) displaying personal info, own posts, and reply history sections.

requirement_tested: User authentication system to manage login and session states
user_persona: A returning user accessing private features.
user_goal: Log in securely to access personalized options.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Login Process
narrative_steps.description: Drew, not currently signed in, clicks the 'Login' option in the header.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Login' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A login modal appears with fields for username/email and password.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Credentials
narrative_steps.description: Drew enters his registered email and secure password then clicks 'Login'.
narrative_steps.action: Enter valid credentials and click the 'Login' button in the modal.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Authentication occurs via POST to `/api/auth/login`. Drew gets redirected to the homepage and now sees 'Logout' instead of 'Login'.

requirement_tested: Post detail pages showing full content and associated replies
user_persona: A curious reader diving deep into a topic.
user_goal: Read an entire post and its conversation thread.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Full Post Details
narrative_steps.description: Eli clicks on a post summary to explore further.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a post entry from the homepage list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to a detailed view page showing the complete post body and chronological list of associated replies.

requirement_tested: UI styled with ghost white background and slate gray components
user_persona: A visually-oriented designer checking brand consistency.
user_goal: Confirm visual style matches the defined palette.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Global Styling
narrative_steps.description: Nina inspects the background and component colors across different pages.
narrative_steps.action: Open DevTools and inspect CSS properties of various elements.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Body background color is confirmed as ghost white (#F8F8FF) and component text/background colors match slate gray (#708090).

requirement_tested: Repository configured with package.json supporting `npm run install:all` and `npm run dev`
user_persona: A developer setting up the project for local development.
user_goal: Install dependencies and launch both frontend and backend simultaneously.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Owen clones the repo and runs the unified install command.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run install:all` in terminal from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend dependencies install successfully as per concurrently defined script.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Once installed, Owen starts both services together.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` in terminal.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend servers start concurrently and remain accessible during development.

requirement_tested: API endpoints for fetching, creating, and managing posts and replies
user_persona: A QA engineer validating backend integrations.
user_goal: Test core CRUD operations for posts and replies via defined API routes.

narrative_steps.title: Fetching Posts
narrative_steps.description: Quinn makes a direct call to retrieve all published posts.
narrative_steps.action: Send a GET request to `/api/posts`.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returns a JSON array of post objects with relevant metadata.

narrative_steps.title: Creating a New Post
narrative_steps.description: Next, Quinn tests submitting a new post through the proper route.
narrative_steps.action: Send a POST request to `/api/posts/create` with valid payload.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server responds with success code and newly created post ID.

requirement_tested: Database schema supporting users, posts, replies, and categories
user_persona: A database administrator verifying structural integrity.
user_goal: Ensure tables exist with correct foreign key relationships.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Table Definitions
narrative_steps.description: Peyton connects to the database to validate table structures.
narrative_steps.action: Query PostgreSQL instance for schema definitions of users, posts, replies, and categories tables.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tables match documented schemas including primary keys, foreign key constraints, and appropriate column types.

requirement_tested: Responsive design compatible across desktop and mobile views
user_persona: A frequent mobile user accessing the forum on-the-go.
user_goal: Use the forum seamlessly on a smartphone.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Layout Adaptation
narrative_steps.description: Uma opens the forum on her phone and checks if the layout adjusts properly.
narrative_steps.action: Resize browser window to simulate mobile resolution or use actual mobile device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Elements reflow appropriately according to responsive breakpoints, stacking vertically when necessary.
